items.name: Mark of Submission
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit
flavourText: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
explicitMods: Base duration is 12.00 seconds
20% increased Curse Duration
+1 metre to radius
Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed Normal or Magic enemies deal 30% less Damage
Cursed Rare or Unique enemies deal 19% less Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.typeLine: Perpetual Silver Flask of the Order
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: 46% increased Charge Recovery
craftedMods: 25% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Gorgon's Gaze
enchantMods: Void Sphere has 30% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
explicitMods: Grants Level 20 Petrification Statue Skill
219% increased Energy Shield
+65 to maximum Life
10% increased Attack and Cast Speed
5% additional Physical Damage Reduction while moving
5% reduced Elemental Damage taken while stationary
flavourText: Men always fell for her honeyed eyes,
and broke when they hit the ground.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that deals damage or has a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 24% more Damage over Time
Supported Skills have 24% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Meginord's Vise
explicitMods: Melee Strike Skills deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
+50 to Strength
197% increased Armour
100% increased Knockback Distance
Melee Hits with Strike Skills always Knockback
flavourText: Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: Base duration is 1.80 seconds
Base secondary duration is 0.20 seconds
30% more Melee Physical Damage
100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
Buff grants 39% increased Movement Speed
Buff grants Phasing
Buff grants 100% increased Stealth

items.name: Widowhail
explicitMods: 250% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver
flavourText: "I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.
explicitMods: 20% increased Area of Effect
Ensnared Enemies take 15% increased Projectile Damage from Attack Hits
Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies
Each Snare applies 30% less Movement Speed to Rare Enemies
Each Snare applies 25% less Movement Speed to Unique Enemies
Maximum 3 Snares per Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills that can be used with bows. Supported skills can only be used with bows. Cannot support Vaal skills, minion skills, movement skills, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.

When you Hit an Enemy with an Arrow from a Supported Skill, Summon a Mirage Archer which uses that Skill
Mirage Archer can use Triggered Attacks as though they were not Triggered
Mirage Archer uses Supported Skill with 60% less Attack Speed
Mirage Archer lasts 4 seconds
Mirage Archer deals 31% less Damage with Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: Deals 27 to 40 Physical Damage
Void Sphere has 10% increased Pulse Frequency
Base duration is 5.00 seconds
Pulses every 0.40 seconds
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 30% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere
